body.name: Lumineux Teeth Whitening Mouthwash, 16 Oz. 2 Pack - Enamel Safe - Certified Non-Toxic - Whiter Teeth in 7 Days or Less Without Sensitivity - NO Alcohol, Fluoride Free & SLS Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 53 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: MADE SAFE certifies products made without known toxic chemicals, by prohibiting substances that harm human health or the environment.

features: Whitening Without The Sensitivity: What does taking care of your mouth mean to us? Well, when it comes to whitening, it means to lift stains without taking the enamel too. Your teeth can and should be whitened without the use of harsh bleaches that damage your tooth structure, leading to sensitivity. (16 oz - Pack of 2)

Clinically Proven: Let’s be honest, all the better-for-you ingredients mean nothing if they don’t prove results. So, we set out to scientifically show your brightest smile could be achieved with Lumineux and we have! With over 50 double-blind, university studies backing us up, Lumineux can proudly say we clean, freshen and whiten without harsh chemicals!

Microbiome Safe: This one is unique. In fact, I would wager that Lumineux is the only oral care company on the market that can claim that we are certified non-toxic and microbiome safe. That means our products actually work with your body to achieve oral health by protecting your good bacteria and detoxifying the bad.

Purposeful & Uncompromising Ingredients: We invite you to check out the ingredients lists on all of our products! They’re packed with ingredients that can nourish and help improve your oral health without preservatives, additives, or artificial dyes or flavorings.

Oils Vs Bleach: Most products use peroxide to remove stains, which removes enamel to get rid of stains. Lumineux uses potent essential oils that break up stains instead, whitening your teeth without damaging your enamel. Plus, they’re yummier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bad taste? Tastes great to me! And lasts.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouthwash. It *was* a bit of a surprise at how strong it tastes initially. I get mint, clove, and even some citrus with every swish, and it keeps my mouth feeling fresh.Since I can’t get fluoride treatments at the dentist due to severe gut reactions, I still use Tom’s of Maine Fluoride mouthwash after brushing after breakfast, and also after brushing and flossing before bed. This is what I use regularly throughout the day to prevent food particles from sitting between teeth, and to prevent tonsil stones.With that, I believe my teeth were already as naturally white as they could be when I started using this product and the toothpaste a few months ago. I’ve not noticed any whitening. But, that doesn’t mean it won’t work for others. Plus, the taste is great, I haven’t had a tonsil stone since starting, and it leaves my mouth feeling fresh and clean for hours after. Worth it.5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work
reviews.reviewText: I haven't noticed a drastic change but it seems to work. Great flavor and leaves my mouth feeling fresh. You aren't supposed to drink anything for 10-15 min after use so the after taste was important to me. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The flavor doesn't taste bad, but not great either. It's ok and tolerable, not bad at all. My breath felt clean afterwards, but my only issue is that I felt that it left my mouth feeling dry after I rinsed it out. As far as whitening, I use multiple whitening products to help, so I'm assuming that this adds to my teeth getting whiter. I'd purchase again though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never bad breath
reviews.reviewText: I am on my 3rd bottle, I purchased on a whim, I do think that if you prefer traditional mouthwashes this may not be for you. I am sensitive to smells, Listerene particularly is overkill and masks smells. My teeth have never been cleaner and my dentist is impressed with the oral care that I had between my most recent cleaning. I have older teeth and it has really improved my overall oral heath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars On the fence about this..
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been on a mission to start getting my teeth whiter, so I tried this mouthwash bc of all of the great reviews. I’m on the fence about the taste.. it’s kind of funky. It’s a mix between listerene, with a hint of mint, but also tastes like a hotdog (weird, I know). Honestly I haven’t seen any difference in my teeth getting whiter either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Taste is not that bad like most ppl say.
reviews.reviewText: The reviews had me nervous because I didn’t read them until after I purchased. The taste is far better than what most people described. I will definitely continue to use it. I will say when you pour it in your mouth it may SEEM tastefully unpleasant but as you swish, it’s not bad AT ALL!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At first the taste threw me off but now I love it and look forward to my night routine. My breath feels so fresh and mouth feels so clean. It god rid of my morning breath too. I haven’t noticed my teeth looking whiter yet but I’ve only used it for a week so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great tasting natural mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: After using this, we can’t go back to the chemical taste of regular mouthwash. I love the ingredients. Just wish it was a little more affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash tastes so rank that I had to use some listerine just to get rid of the after taste!!! Flushed the rest straight down the toilet! This is the worst thing I've ever had in my mouth, and that's saying a LOT.
